articles.title: Protective vaccination rates falling out of reach in US; exemptions hit record - Ars Technica
articles.description: Vaccination exemptions among kindergartners rose from 2.6% to a record high of 3%.

articles.title: Frank Borman, commander of the first mission to orbit the Moon, has died - Ars Technica
articles.description: "The Earth looked so lonely in the Universe. It's the only thing with color."
articles.content:
